title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Innovative Teaching Strategies for Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in science and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of high instructor involvement on learning effectiveness when designing tests in online environments.
Learners determine appropriate levels of instructor involvement in project-based activities and establish self-directed learning promotion strategies.
Learners explain the instructor’s role in managing flexible content (activities/assessments) in technology-supported learning environments with three or more specific examples.
Learners classify and evaluate learning environment quality factors affecting learner satisfaction and persistence into two stages (rigidity/flexibility).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
